doc:
House Peters Jr. https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/House_Peters_Jr. 0 Robert House Peters Jr. (12 January 1916 – 1 October 2008) was an American character actor most noted for his roles in 1950s B movies and westerns. He is perhaps best remembered as the face and body of Mr. Clean in the Procter and Gamble cleaning product commercials of the era. Robert_House_Peters_Jr. ( 12_January_1916 – 1_October_2008 ) was an_American_character_actor most_noted for his_roles in 1950s_B_movies_and_westerns . He is_perhaps_best_remembered as the_face_and_body of Mr._Clean in the_Procter_and_Gamble_cleaning_product_commercials of the_era .
